Whether sort of transparent triangles is enabled. When enabled, any object which is to be drawn in a transparent colour is split into its component triangles and sorted over several bins (representing slices in the z direction). Rendering is a little slower with this option enabled, but corrects most transparency artefacts with sensible bin values.
